Package src.registrationCard

Class RegistrationCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.registrationCard.RegistrationCard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NoRegistrationCard, VlibreRegistrationCard, VmaxRegistrationCard
    public abstract class RegistrationCard
extends java.lang.Object
    This class describes a base Registration card.

        Instantiates a new Registration card.
        Parameters:
        handlesTimeCredit - does the card handles time credit or not
        firstHourFareMechanical - the first hour fare when renting a mechanical bike
        nextHoursFareMechanical - the next hours fare when renting a mechanical bike
        firstHourFareElectrical - the first hour fare when renting a electrical bike
        nextHoursFareElectrical - the next hours fare when renting a electrical bike
